BackstoryDef.title: Shuttle pilot
BackstoryDef.description: A natural pilot, [PAWN_nameDef] has flown shuttles and other craft through the most perilous conditions imaginable. [PAWN_pronoun] is unflappable, has been around the block, and is always ready to throw down in a bar brawl - or socialize with roughnecks and glitterati alike.
